revised_title: On the Magnifying Power of the Half-Prism and its Applications in Spectroscopy
tldr: The author investigates the magnifying power of the half-prism and its effects on dispersion and purity in spectroscopy. He demonstrates that the half-prism can be used as a magnifier and can improve the dispersion and separation of spectral lines, potentially replacing multiple isosceles prisms in spectroscope design.
